summary: ooh for prompts, dany/yara in an au where dany takes the throne? love your writing 💕💕💕
question: ooh for prompts, dany/yara in an au where dany takes the throne? love your writing 💕💕💕
answer:
Her fingers trail over the armrest, lifting to hover when there’s sharp edges or uneven welding. The room is empty, giving Daenerys a moment to absorb what’s happened. Years of trauma, violence, and grief have manifested itself into one seat. There is still so much to be done, but this moment is for her.

Daenerys turns around, and sinks into the Iron Throne.

All of Westeros looks out beyond her.

-

Yara takes stock of the damages, lips pressed in a thin line as her Captains all gradually report in.

“How many?” She asks, not turning to look as she pulls down on riggings. Half the sails on her flagship need replacing. The heat in the Crownlands is enough for her to have discarded her usual duster, and since they’ve now found themselves in peace time she’s also replaced her armor for lighter, linen fabrics with leathers to cover her forearms and chest.

Arnolf, one of her best Captains, is straightforward as always. “Ten ships completely sunk. At least one thousand claimed by the Drowned God.”

She takes this in with a curt jut of her chin. “And the rest?”

“Fifteen damaged but repairable. Another thirty claimed from Euron’s fleet.”

That makes her smile. “What is dead may never die,” she says in dismissal.

Arnolf nods. “What is dead may never die.”

Yara looks out beyond the docks, where her fleet stands proud, banners of Krakens and Dragons flying in tandem like something out of a child’s nightmare.

The Islands are finally hers, bought and paid for by the iron price.

She finishes taking down the ruined sails, and wishes her brother were here to see it.

–

The feast is more subdued than the one after the Long Night, but no less celebratory. Daenerys smiles quietly as she takes in her forces and allies: Jon among the Northman, Grey Worm and Missandei sitting among the Unsullied. The Dothraki, shouting and rowdy and she’s sure some will leave in order to fight in celebration.

And Yara with the Iron Born.

Daenerys catches her eye from the head table, and Yara stops whatever rowdy tale she is sharing with her men to send her a lazy smirk.

The Queen of the Seven Kingdoms tilts her head toward an empty hall, and Yara raises the goblet of wine in her hand.

–

Yara presses her against the wall, her dry hands grabbing the front of her fine dress. She takes in Dany’s soft expression before she brings her lips down to hers, deep and slow as she parts her lips with her tongue. Dany sighs, a tension from her shoulders unleashing as her hands fold behind Yara’s neck, fingers tangling in her hair. Reluctantly, Yara pulls back, pressing her forehead to hers.

“How does it feel, cutting the balls off the Lannisters?”

Dany gives a small hum. A contented noise, like she’s unable to articulate what she’s feeling through words. Her thumb slides along Yara’s jawline, and she tilts her head up to press another, chaster kiss. “How does it feel to control the Iron Islands?”

“Overdue,” Yara breathes. “And fucking incredible.”

She smiles. “You saved my fleet from your uncle.”

Yara grabs one of her hands with her own, slowly drawing her thumb over the thin skin of her wrist. “My pleasure.”

“And what comes next, for the ruler of the Salt Throne?”

Yara smiles. “Well…” She presses a light kiss beneath her ear, on her neck. “Since there’s no raping or pillaging to be done, I’m open to suggestions.”

“I’m sure I can come up with something.”

Yara nods, her hand drifting down to her hip. Then lower. “Until then, I think I have an idea for the next few hours.”

Dany grins. “I do have a new room.”

“Then let’s break it in, Your Grace.”

summary: Losing my Religion - TheGeniusCallsYou - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Losing my Religion - TheGeniusCallsYou - Game of Thrones (TV) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/1
Fandom: Game of Thrones (TV), A Song of Ice and Fire - George R. R. Martin
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: Major Character Death
Relationships: Jorah Mormont/Daenerys Targaryen
Characters: Daenerys Targaryen, Jorah Mormont
Additional Tags: Bittersweet, post 8x05, Post 8x06, Angst, The Red Door, his place is by her side, Happy Ending, i think
Summary:

“I don’t want to wake up from this dream.”

It felt real. From his shirt crumpled in her hands to his scent entering her nostrils. She wished so desperately for it to be so and it hurt even more that it couldn’t be. Why? Why couldn’t she appreciate what she had right before her eyes?
She could feel his lips slightly curling against the side of her head. She didn’t need to look up to know it was a sad smile.

“We’ve both seen dragons being born to this world and dead rising from their graves. Who said this must be a dream?”

summary: I don’t like going out often...
title: I don’t like going out often...
body:
I’ve become very recluse I guess, partly because I feel like I’m socially awkward & partly because I’m not happy with how I look & I just don’t feel like being in public. Grocery shopping or walking with the kids is one thing but as soon as you tell me I have to go to a gathering where I have to be all schmoozing with people I get like this:

Then I’m told just for a little while so I wait…two hours go by…

My sugars high from being “polite” & eating even though I’m not hungry, I want to get naked & do the hibbity dibbity or damn it I just want to sit on my couch scroll through Tumblr & watch some high-quality TV!

Then finally…I’m going home…I’m so happy I could cry…

& then I can happily relax in the comfort of my home no fucks to be given.

summary: Burning ember ch.3
body:
Burning ember ch.3

A/N- its a long one! I hope you guys like this one :)

Warning- Physical abuse, language, violence, incest.

Episode- 1x05, 1x06

Pairing- Viserys x tagaryen!reader , Aegon x Targaryen! Reader

Tagged- @starkbelova , @kaleidoscope-holds-the-prophecy , @omgsuperstarg

(Let me know if you want to be tagged)

—

The chanting is loud and they’re all around her watching her carefully as she eats the horse heart. It’s a ceremony they do when a khaleesi is expecting a child. If she eats the whole heart and doesn’t throw any of it up then that means the unborn child is going to be strong. And if she can’t finish it or throws any of it up then it’s a bad sign. And honestly you don’t know how you feel about her having a baby with the khal. You don’t know if this affects anything with you getting the throne.

You stand and listen to the chanting and listen to Viserys and Ser Jorah having their own conversation on the side. When she finishes the heart you see that she bends down and looks like she’s about to throw it up. You lean in closer watching what was going to go down. Deep down you wish she would throw it up. But when she lifts her head she swallows hard and they start chanting again. You want to feel happy for her but you can’t you don’t. Her having a son means everything.

“A prince rides inside me! And he shall be called Rheago!” Daenerys says as she stands up with pride.

“Rheago! Rheago!” The people chant only causing you to feel some certain way. You look over at Aegon who is already looking at you and he has the same reaction as you. And then you turn to see Viserys who seems to be lost in his own thoughts but by his frown it seems he’s thinking the same thing as you and Aegon.

“They love her.” You hear Viserys say beside you. She’s beginning to be a threat not only to Viserys but to Aegon and you. Before you can muster up a fake smile to Daenerys way, you feel yourself getting pulled outside.

You look to the person who’s pulling you and you weren’t suprised that it was Viserys. You try to pull your arm from his grip but his grip his hard around your arm.

“What are you doing?!” You yell at him as he drags you. He ignored you and continued walking and you kept struggling to be let go from his grip. “Viserys!” You try to get his attention but he still ignores you. It’s not until you get to your shared tent where he lets go and he gets his weapons. He grabs your weapons to and throws them to your feet. “Viserys What In seven hells are you doing!!” You yell at him. This time he whips his head to your direction. You notice the look he has in his eyes. It didn’t scare you but it wasn’t a good or happy look.

“What does it look like im doing we’re leaving!” He yells the anger in his voice very clear. You furrow your eyebrows and walk closer to him. You couldn’t leave not yet you still needed their army even if Daenerys was beginning to be a threat you still needed their army to get back what rightfully belongs to Aegon and you.

“No we still need them we can’t leave now!” You argue but he only laughs and walks over to your dragon egg. You walk over to him and pull his arm as he’s about to grab it. “Leave it there!” He turns and grips on to your arm.

“How do you think we’re going to get money to buy my army huh? You Martells aren’t the richest in the seven kingdoms and your army is too small to go into war to get the throne! Without money we can’t get an army!” He argues and goes to grab your egg again but you push him down.

“I’m not going anywhere with you!” You see the anger in his eyes. It was their before but he seemed angrier it was a deadly look. He stands up and grips onto both of your arms. You can feel his nails dig into your skin. But you don’t wince or get scared of the pain.

“You’re my wife! You do what I say when I say it! And if i say we’re leaving that means we’re leaving! Without you then I don’t have the martells on my side.” He yells at you. You swallowed thickly and had determination in your look. You put on a fake smile and he seemed to be confused. With what little motion you have in your hands you grab his wrists and then lift your knee and knee him in the stomach. He groans in pain and bends down wrapping his arms around his stomach.

“You little Bitch!” He yells his face was red now but you still weren’t afraid. You stood tall were you were as he glared up at you. He straightened himself up. He walked over to you but you didn’t leave or move out of his way instead you stayed there and watched as came closer. He had a smirk on his face as his face got closer to yours. “That was a huge mistake…. you are lucky that I can’t kill you because I still need you but you just woke the dragon.” He threatens you. He puts his hand on your throat and begins to squeeze it tightly making it hard for you to breathe. With your hands you grip onto his hand that’s around your neck and try to pull it off but it’s harder then you thought.

“Viserys let her go!” You hear Ser Jorah yell. Viserys whips his head to where he stands. Aegon enters behind him and he sees what’s going and his features turn into an angry scowl. He’s about to grab your weapons that are on the ground but Ser Jorah stops him.

“Don’t.” He whispers to Aegon. “Viserys let her go now!” Viserys has that same stupid grin on his face but you feel him loosen his grip around your neck and then completely lets go making you fall to the ground. Aegon pushes Ser Jorahs hand out of the way and rushes over to where you were. Before he could check if you were alright he stands in front of Viserys in a challenging stance his hand is in a tight fist.

“Aegon don’t. Remember the law you’re not allowed to spill blood in Vaes Dothrak.” Ser Jorah warns him. Aegon swallows thickly. You know he wants to kill him for what he was doing but he also respects the rules unlike Viserys. He huffs out in defeat and He finally kneels down to where you were on the floor. Your hands around the offended area and trying to grasp for air. You knew their was going to be a bruise there.

“Are you alright? He do anything else to you?” He asks in a worried tone. You simply nod and he wraps his arm around your shoulders and picks you up to your feet.

“Don’t let them see you carry a sword in Vaes Dothrak you know the law.” Ser Jorah tells Viserys when he sees his sword and dagger on him.

“It’s not my law.” Viserys says not caring as he goes back to your egg and picks it up and puts it in his bag.

“That doesn’t belong to you.” Ser Jorah tells him before you could say anything to Viserys.

“whatever is hers is also mine.” Viserys says to him.

“Leave it where it was Viserys.” Aegon threatens. Viserys just glared at Aegon before turning his gaze back at Ser Jorah.

“If I sell one egg I have enough for an army and if sell two out of three Daenerys eggs I’ll have enough for a ship and an army.” Viserys spats.

“That’s four.”

“I need a large army.” Viserys takes a step closer to Ser Jorah. You want to go and snatch your egg from him but you watch carefully. “I’m the last hope for the dynasty Mormont the greatest dynasty the world has ever seen on my shoulders since I was 5 years old and no one has ever given me what they give to her on that tent. Never not a piece of it. Not even my own wife.” He says his voice breaking slightly as he looks over to you quickly but then returns his gaze back at Mormont. “How can I carry what I need to carry without it hmm? Who can rule without wealth, fear or love?”

You’re getting imapatient as you see that Viserys doesn’t drop your egg. But you also are getting to trust Ser Jorah and you know he wouldn’t let him walk out with it. Viserys continues to talk to Ser Jorah in a whisper It was a small space so you could hear what he told to him. Telling him some truths and now that he points them out and hear it aloud you fully see that they’re true.

“Does loyalty mean nothing to you?” Viserys asks Ser Jorah.

“It means everything to me.”

“And yet here you stand.”

“And yet here I stand.”

Viserys looks over at you and then drops the bag and then he stomps out of the tent. Ser Jorah picks up the bag and walks over to you.

“Are you alright?” He asks concerned.

“I’m alright now thank you Ser Jorah.” You tell him because if he hadn’t entered when he had you didn’t know what would’ve happened. He hands the bag over to you and Aegon takes it. Ser Jorah does a small bow.

“I’m loyal to you both and Daenerys. And we’re going to need to talk about we needs to happen about Viserys. He’s not fit to rule.”

“We’ve noticed.” Aegon says.

“We also need to talk about other matters but let’s wait for Daenerys to be with us.” He says and aegons gives him a quick nod in agreement before Ser Jorah leaves. Leaving Aegon and you alone. He turns you and cups your cheeks.

“Are you sure you’re alright?” He asks again.

“I’m alright.” You tell him with a smile on your face.

“Your marriage to him is going to be annulled I don’t care I know our uncle will understand.” He says his face full with worry. “I wanted to kill him and I still do.”

“Not here not yet.” You say to him.

“I know but i can’t let him hurt you.”

“He won’t not ever again. But please let’s not talk him now.”

“As you wish.” He says with a warm smile as he pulls you in for a kiss.

-

Aegon and you make your way over to the tent where they were going to have the feast. You make it inside and theirs people dancing around the fire. Khal Drogo is drinking and talking with his blood riders in one corner and Daenerys is talking with Ser Jorah and Doreah in another. You notice that her eyes instantly land on your brother Aegon as he comes in by your side. She smiles his way but as you turn to see his reaction it seems like he was trying to avoid her gaze. You can’t help but glare her way. As you feel the jealousy in you rise. She seemed to notice so she turned her attention back to Daenerys. Not seconds later Daenerys sees you and walks over and she stands up her face full with concern.

“I’m so sorry for what happened.” She says as she stands in front of you. You smile and your hand goes up to your neck where the bruise was already showing.

“You weren’t the one that did it.” You reassure her with a smile.

“But my brother did and it wasn’t alright that he did that you he could’ve killed you.” It’s actions like these that make you regret what you think of her. She nothing like her brother and she doesn’t deserve what you think of her. But if she’s a threat then the threat can’t live. it’s something that you’ll have to deal with if you like it or not. But maybe it’s like Ser Jorah said we can talk about what needs to happen next and that’s not only including Viserys.

“But he didn’t so please don’t feel guilty for his doings because he sure doesn’t…….and please enough of him we’re in a feast it’s time to enjoy it.” She smiles at your last words and she takes you by the hand to where she was.

It had seemed that being here in the feast made you forget of what had happened earlier that day. You were talking and laughing along with Daenerys and Ser Jorah. Even if Doreah was there and you couldn’t miss the looks she gave your brother you tried your best not to go over there and drag her into the fire by her hair. But like always It was Aegon that mostly kept you calm he always did. And he was one of the only people that could beside your uncles who were on the other side of the sea.

Your enjoyment didn’t last as long as you wanted to though. It was ruined at the sound of Viserys stumbling into the tent drunk.

“Daenerys! Where’s my sister! And my wife!” Viserys yelled from entrance of the tent. The sight of him made you roll your eyes. Aegon stood up and was about to walk over but Ser Jorah stopped him.

“No my prince you stay here I’ll go.” See Jorah said to him as he had his arm out to stop him from going any further.

“He has his weapons on him I’m going to help you.” Aegon argued.

“More of the reason you should stay put especially after what happened earlier. Stay here and guard your sister and Daenerys in case he tries anything.” Aegon is hesitant but he doesn’t follow after Ser Jorah.

“Where is she! Where’s my sister! Where’s my wife! I’m here for the feast! The whores feast!” Viserys yelled. Ser Jorah grabbed him by the hand but Viserys pushed it off.

“Get your hands off me! No one touches the dragon!” Viserys spats at Ser Jorah. One of khal Drogos blood riders says something and khal Drogo laughs causing Viserys to turn his way.

“Khal Drogo! I’m here for the feast!” Viserys keeps making his way over. Khal Drogo tells him that he belonged outside but Viserys didn’t understand. After all this time here he still hadn’t learned their language which is ridiculous since he wants them to go to war for him.

“That is no place for a king.” Viserys tells him. You watch their interaction carefully.

“You are no king.” Khal Drogo says in your common tongue suprising you just a bit. Only making Viserys angrier. When Ser Jorah tried pulling him out he pulled his sword out and had it pointing at him threatening him.

“Viserys please.” Daenerys said to him.

“There She is.” Viserys turned his head her way.

“Put the sword down! They’ll kill us all.” Ser Jorah warned him.

“They can’t kill us. They can’t shed blood in their sacred city.” He got closer to where you all where. His sword out and pointing at anyone in front of him. Aegon pulled Daenerys and you behind him protectively not letting Viserys sword or himself anywhere nearby.

-

(Aegon’s P.O.V)

At the sight of Viserys stumbling in Drunk and angry Aegons enjoyment died down and was replaced with anger. He wanted to kill him for what he did to his sister but he knew that he couldn’t not here anyway.

He got in front of his sister and Daenerys protectively to keep them both out of Viserys reach. Daenerys tried to push him to the side but he didn’t let her because he knew that he would hurt her and he couldn’t let that happen. Viserys had a smirk on his face as he put the swords end inches from his neck.

“I want what I came for. I want the crown he promised me. He bought you but he never payed for you. Tell him I want what was bargained for or I’m taking you back he can keep the baby. I’ll cut it out and leave it for him.” Viserys says talking directly to Daenerys who was behind Aegon. Aegon heard what Khal Drogo said and he knew what he meant by it. He was going to get his crown but maybe not the way he would like it.

“He says yes you shall have a golden crown that men should should tremble to behold.” Daenerys said from behind him only making Viserys smile and lowering his weapon from in front of his neck.

“That’s all I wanted what what was promised.” Viserys said. He still had his weopon out but he was distracted so Aegon took this as his chance and grabbed his arm and took his sword and threw it to the ground. Aegon pushed Viserys back but it’s like it didn’t bother him he was to occupied with his crown that was promised. Aegon looked over at khal drogos bloodriders giving them a quick nod telling them that it was okay for them to get close. Once they did they broke his arm and Viserys started to panic. Aegon went to stand by his sister who was standing watching carefully.

“No! No! You cannot touch me I’m the dragon! I want my crown!” Viserys yelled in anger. Khal Drogo put his golden belt and put it in burning pot. When Viserys saw his eyes went wide and were full of panic and fear the anger not there no more.

“Danny! Don’t Dany tell them make them make them!” Viserys yelled trying to save himself but Daenerys didn’t say anything. Aegon noticed that Viserys shifted his gaze over to his sister.

“Y/N? Please! I’m sorry! Please!” He kept pleading. His eyes seemed to grow wider at the sight of Khal Drogo picking the pot up. “Dany please!”

Aegon tried to cover the sight of what was going to happen but his sister only moved so she could see.

“A crown for a king.” Khal Drogo then poured then melted gold onto Viserys head causing him to fall to the ground. The gold making a big thunk noise as his lifeless body fell. Even if Aegon didn’t like him he couldn’t deny that dying that way was horrible.

Aegon looked back at his sister to see her reaction but she didn’t seem bothered by it. It seemed like she showed no emotion but unlike Daenerys, he saw that his sister had a slight smirk. He knew that she didn’t like him but it’s also a reaction that he didn’t like to see. Her look looked cold and emotionless. Like if what she had seen was normal. He knew that his sister was more tolerable to things like this but getting your head melted off was something different. And he couldn’t help but feel chills at the sight of her smirk.

.

.

.

.

.

.

You look to the person who’s pulling you and you weren’t suprised that it was Viserys. You try to pull your arm from his grip but his grip his hard around your arm.

“What are you doing?!” You yell at him as he drags you. He ignored you and continued walking and you kept struggling to be let go from his grip. “Viserys!” You try to get his attention but he still ignores you. It’s not until you get to your shared tent where he lets go and he gets his weapons. He grabs your weapons to and throws them to your feet. “Viserys What In seven hells are you doing!!” You yell at him. This time he whips his head to your direction. You notice the look he has in his eyes. It didn’t scare you but it wasn’t a good or happy look.

“What does it look like im doing we’re leaving!” He yells the anger in his voice very clear. You furrow your eyebrows and walk closer to him. You couldn’t leave not yet you still needed their army even if Daenerys was beginning to be a threat you still needed their army to get back what rightfully belongs to Aegon and you.

“No we still need them we can’t leave now!” You argue but he only laughs and walks over to your dragon egg. You walk over to him and pull his arm as he’s about to grab it. “Leave it there!” He turns and grips on to your arm.

“How do you think we’re going to get money to buy my army huh? You Martells aren’t the richest in the seven kingdoms and your army is too small to go into war to get the throne! Without money we can’t get an army!” He argues and goes to grab your egg again but you push him down.

“I’m not going anywhere with you!” You see the anger in his eyes. It was their before but he seemed angrier it was a deadly look. He stands up and grips onto both of your arms. You can feel his nails dig into your skin. But you don’t wince or get scared of the pain.

“You’re my wife! You do what I say when I say it! And if i say we’re leaving that means we’re leaving! Without you then I don’t have the martells on my side.” He yells at you. You swallowed thickly and had determination in your look. You put on a fake smile and he seemed to be confused. With what little motion you have in your hands you grab his wrists and then lift your knee and knee him in the stomach. He groans in pain and bends down wrapping his arms around his stomach.

“You little Bitch!” He yells his face was red now but you still weren’t afraid. You stood tall were you were as he glared up at you. He straightened himself up. He walked over to you but you didn’t leave or move out of his way instead you stayed there and watched as came closer. He had a smirk on his face as his face got closer to yours. “That was a huge mistake…. you are lucky that I can’t kill you because I still need you but you just woke the dragon.” He threatens you. He puts his hand on your throat and begins to squeeze it tightly making it hard for you to breathe. With your hands you grip onto his hand that’s around your neck and try to pull it off but it’s harder then you thought.

“Viserys let her go!” You hear Ser Jorah yell. Viserys whips his head to where he stands. Aegon enters behind him and he sees what’s going and his features turn into an angry scowl. He’s about to grab your weapons that are on the ground but Ser Jorah stops him.

“Don’t.” He whispers to Aegon. “Viserys let her go now!” Viserys has that same stupid grin on his face but you feel him loosen his grip around your neck and then completely lets go making you fall to the ground. Aegon pushes Ser Jorahs hand out of the way and rushes over to where you were. Before he could check if you were alright he stands in front of Viserys in a challenging stance his hand is in a tight fist.

“Aegon don’t. Remember the law you’re not allowed to spill blood in Vaes Dothrak.” Ser Jorah warns him. Aegon swallows thickly. You know he wants to kill him for what he was doing but he also respects the rules unlike Viserys. He huffs out in defeat and He finally kneels down to where you were on the floor. Your hands around the offended area and trying to grasp for air. You knew their was going to be a bruise there.

“Are you alright? He do anything else to you?” He asks in a worried tone. You simply nod and he wraps his arm around your shoulders and picks you up to your feet.

“Don’t let them see you carry a sword in Vaes Dothrak you know the law.” Ser Jorah tells Viserys when he sees his sword and dagger on him.

“It’s not my law.” Viserys says not caring as he goes back to your egg and picks it up and puts it in his bag.

“That doesn’t belong to you.” Ser Jorah tells him before you could say anything to Viserys.

“whatever is hers is also mine.” Viserys says to him.

“Leave it where it was Viserys.” Aegon threatens. Viserys just glared at Aegon before turning his gaze back at Ser Jorah.

“If I sell one egg I have enough for an army and if sell two out of three Daenerys eggs I’ll have enough for a ship and an army.” Viserys spats.

“That’s four.”

“I need a large army.” Viserys takes a step closer to Ser Jorah. You want to go and snatch your egg from him but you watch carefully. “I’m the last hope for the dynasty Mormont the greatest dynasty the world has ever seen on my shoulders since I was 5 years old and no one has ever given me what they give to her on that tent. Never not a piece of it. Not even my own wife.” He says his voice breaking slightly as he looks over to you quickly but then returns his gaze back at Mormont. “How can I carry what I need to carry without it hmm? Who can rule without wealth, fear or love?”

You’re getting imapatient as you see that Viserys doesn’t drop your egg. But you also are getting to trust Ser Jorah and you know he wouldn’t let him walk out with it. Viserys continues to talk to Ser Jorah in a whisper It was a small space so you could hear what he told to him. Telling him some truths and now that he points them out and hear it aloud you fully see that they’re true.

“Does loyalty mean nothing to you?” Viserys asks Ser Jorah.

“It means everything to me.”

“And yet here you stand.”

“And yet here I stand.”

Viserys looks over at you and then drops the bag and then he stomps out of the tent. Ser Jorah picks up the bag and walks over to you.

“Are you alright?” He asks concerned.

“I’m alright now thank you Ser Jorah.” You tell him because if he hadn’t entered when he had you didn’t know what would’ve happened. He hands the bag over to you and Aegon takes it. Ser Jorah does a small bow.

“I’m loyal to you both and Daenerys. And we’re going to need to talk about we needs to happen about Viserys. He’s not fit to rule.”

“We’ve noticed.” Aegon says.

“We also need to talk about other matters but let’s wait for Daenerys to be with us.” He says and aegons gives him a quick nod in agreement before Ser Jorah leaves. Leaving Aegon and you alone. He turns you and cups your cheeks.

“Are you sure you’re alright?” He asks again.

“I’m alright.” You tell him with a smile on your face.

“Your marriage to him is going to be annulled I don’t care I know our uncle will understand.” He says his face full with worry. “I wanted to kill him and I still do.”

“Not here not yet.” You say to him.

“I know but i can’t let him hurt you.”

“He won’t not ever again. But please let’s not talk him now.”

“As you wish.” He says with a warm smile as he pulls you in for a kiss.

-

Aegon and you make your way over to the tent where they were going to have the feast. You make it inside and theirs people dancing around the fire. Khal Drogo is drinking and talking with his blood riders in one corner and Daenerys is talking with Ser Jorah and Doreah in another. You notice that her eyes instantly land on your brother Aegon as he comes in by your side. She smiles his way but as you turn to see his reaction it seems like he was trying to avoid her gaze. You can’t help but glare her way. As you feel the jealousy in you rise. She seemed to notice so she turned her attention back to Daenerys. Not seconds later Daenerys sees you and walks over and she stands up her face full with concern.

“I’m so sorry for what happened.” She says as she stands in front of you. You smile and your hand goes up to your neck where the bruise was already showing.

“You weren’t the one that did it.” You reassure her with a smile.

“But my brother did and it wasn’t alright that he did that you he could’ve killed you.” It’s actions like these that make you regret what you think of her. She nothing like her brother and she doesn’t deserve what you think of her. But if she’s a threat then the threat can’t live. it’s something that you’ll have to deal with if you like it or not. But maybe it’s like Ser Jorah said we can talk about what needs to happen next and that’s not only including Viserys.

“But he didn’t so please don’t feel guilty for his doings because he sure doesn’t…….and please enough of him we’re in a feast it’s time to enjoy it.” She smiles at your last words and she takes you by the hand to where she was.

It had seemed that being here in the feast made you forget of what had happened earlier that day. You were talking and laughing along with Daenerys and Ser Jorah. Even if Doreah was there and you couldn’t miss the looks she gave your brother you tried your best not to go over there and drag her into the fire by her hair. But like always It was Aegon that mostly kept you calm he always did. And he was one of the only people that could beside your uncles who were on the other side of the sea.

Your enjoyment didn’t last as long as you wanted to though. It was ruined at the sound of Viserys stumbling into the tent drunk.

“Daenerys! Where’s my sister! And my wife!” Viserys yelled from entrance of the tent. The sight of him made you roll your eyes. Aegon stood up and was about to walk over but Ser Jorah stopped him.

“No my prince you stay here I’ll go.” See Jorah said to him as he had his arm out to stop him from going any further.

“He has his weapons on him I’m going to help you.” Aegon argued.

“More of the reason you should stay put especially after what happened earlier. Stay here and guard your sister and Daenerys in case he tries anything.” Aegon is hesitant but he doesn’t follow after Ser Jorah.

“Where is she! Where’s my sister! Where’s my wife! I’m here for the feast! The whores feast!” Viserys yelled. Ser Jorah grabbed him by the hand but Viserys pushed it off.

“Get your hands off me! No one touches the dragon!” Viserys spats at Ser Jorah. One of khal Drogos blood riders says something and khal Drogo laughs causing Viserys to turn his way.

“Khal Drogo! I’m here for the feast!” Viserys keeps making his way over. Khal Drogo tells him that he belonged outside but Viserys didn’t understand. After all this time here he still hadn’t learned their language which is ridiculous since he wants them to go to war for him.

“That is no place for a king.” Viserys tells him. You watch their interaction carefully.

“You are no king.” Khal Drogo says in your common tongue suprising you just a bit. Only making Viserys angrier. When Ser Jorah tried pulling him out he pulled his sword out and had it pointing at him threatening him.

“Viserys please.” Daenerys said to him.

“There She is.” Viserys turned his head her way.

“Put the sword down! They’ll kill us all.” Ser Jorah warned him.

“They can’t kill us. They can’t shed blood in their sacred city.” He got closer to where you all where. His sword out and pointing at anyone in front of him. Aegon pulled Daenerys and you behind him protectively not letting Viserys sword or himself anywhere nearby.

-

(Aegon’s P.O.V)

At the sight of Viserys stumbling in Drunk and angry Aegons enjoyment died down and was replaced with anger. He wanted to kill him for what he did to his sister but he knew that he couldn’t not here anyway.

He got in front of his sister and Daenerys protectively to keep them both out of Viserys reach. Daenerys tried to push him to the side but he didn’t let her because he knew that he would hurt her and he couldn’t let that happen. Viserys had a smirk on his face as he put the swords end inches from his neck.

“I want what I came for. I want the crown he promised me. He bought you but he never payed for you. Tell him I want what was bargained for or I’m taking you back he can keep the baby. I’ll cut it out and leave it for him.” Viserys says talking directly to Daenerys who was behind Aegon. Aegon heard what Khal Drogo said and he knew what he meant by it. He was going to get his crown but maybe not the way he would like it.

“He says yes you shall have a golden crown that men should should tremble to behold.” Daenerys said from behind him only making Viserys smile and lowering his weapon from in front of his neck.

“That’s all I wanted what what was promised.” Viserys said. He still had his weopon out but he was distracted so Aegon took this as his chance and grabbed his arm and took his sword and threw it to the ground. Aegon pushed Viserys back but it’s like it didn’t bother him he was to occupied with his crown that was promised. Aegon looked over at khal drogos bloodriders giving them a quick nod telling them that it was okay for them to get close. Once they did they broke his arm and Viserys started to panic. Aegon went to stand by his sister who was standing watching carefully.

“No! No! You cannot touch me I’m the dragon! I want my crown!” Viserys yelled in anger. Khal Drogo put his golden belt and put it in burning pot. When Viserys saw his eyes went wide and were full of panic and fear the anger not there no more.

“Danny! Don’t Dany tell them make them make them!” Viserys yelled trying to save himself but Daenerys didn’t say anything. Aegon noticed that Viserys shifted his gaze over to his sister.

“Y/N? Please! I’m sorry! Please!” He kept pleading. His eyes seemed to grow wider at the sight of Khal Drogo picking the pot up. “Dany please!”

Aegon tried to cover the sight of what was going to happen but his sister only moved so she could see.

“A crown for a king.” Khal Drogo then poured then melted gold onto Viserys head causing him to fall to the ground. The gold making a big thunk noise as his lifeless body fell. Even if Aegon didn’t like him he couldn’t deny that dying that way was horrible.

Aegon looked back at his sister to see her reaction but she didn’t seem bothered by it. It seemed like she showed no emotion but unlike Daenerys, he saw that his sister had a slight smirk. He knew that she didn’t like him but it’s also a reaction that he didn’t like to see. Her look looked cold and emotionless. Like if what she had seen was normal. He knew that his sister was more tolerable to things like this but getting your head melted off was something different. And he couldn’t help but feel chills at the sight of her smirk.

.

.

.

.

.

.

summary: Hi, I know you really hated Dany’s arc in season 8 of got but how do you feel about Eren’s recent development and do you think...
question: Hi, I know you really hated Dany’s arc in season 8 of got but how do you feel about Eren’s recent development and do you think it compares with how dany’s arc was developed?
answer:
It’s much better lol.

I think Eren is how you develop a character who is your protagonist as the villain. You can’t switch coding like that successfully most of the time. Dany being a prime example.

The reason it works for Eren right now (its ultimate success depends on when we finally get his thoughts, and I will add that the pacing is, as usual, to the story’s detriment) is because there’s a mysterious four-year time gap in which we have… a lot of questions. We’ve received hints about what is going on, but we don’t have the full story. We just know that he still seems to want to protect people–consistent as always–yet is prone to lashing out at people who don’t agree with hm (just like always). There is certainly a leap there to genocide, but we also saw him in the moments before he committed it, empathizing with Reiner and reminding us of who Eren is and giving us hope that he has some kind of plan, even if it’s a disastrous one with a tragic ending. Eren has noble goals. Dany was also kind of portrayed as having good goals (ending slavery) except… they didn’t at all explain how her actions were remotely connected to ending slavery. It made no sense.

In SnK, every other character is also spiraling via delving into their worst instincts, so it’s not like Eren is being singled out by the narrative (see: Historia sacrificing herself, Levi resorting to extreme violence and torture, Armin being passive as hell, Mikasa clinging to Eren when something is very wrong). And they’re all suffering for it. Eren just almost got chomped, Mikasa and Armin are locked up and Mikasa’s love told her she was a slave, Historia is pregnant, Levi is half-alive. In GoT, Dany was the only character punished for her actions (Arya anyone? Freaking Cersei, who turned out to have been… right not to send troops north to fight for the living?) in season 8, which is unsatisfying as hell.

Eren is framed as having choices–people are begging him to rely on them, to listen. Dany was not framed as having choices: she was damned if she does and damned if she doesn’t for every single choice this season. Like, her refusing food from Varys was seen as evidence of her madness, yet Varys was also poisoning her food, so… you’re not paranoid if people are all out to get you.

And even so, the narrative is empathetic to Eren. I don’t doubt he’ll find humanity and be able to share where he’s coming from with certain key people (Mikasa, maybe more) before the end. We hurt for him and for his loved ones, and we know he could be better than this. Dany was just… they went so far as to give her Nuremberg imagery to discourage sympathy and had their actors tell the audience they were “culpable” in cheering her for doing actions every single other character also did, which is incredibly offensive. They also chalked it up to fate “every time a Targaryen is born the gods flip a coin” which is generally unsatisfying especially given the weight on choices throughout GOT.

Sigh. I have thoughts lol. In short: thus far, Eren’s Dark Side twist is working for me. The reveal of his true plans will, of course, dramatically affect this, but I don’t hate it. Dany’s turn made noooo sense whatsoever.
